snippet: Asian shares and currencies were mostly firmer on Monday in the wake of surprisingly weak U.S. jobs numbers that revived speculation the Federal Reserve could keep policy loose for longer....

headline.print_headline: Asian Shares Mostly Firmer, Gold Hits One-Month High
headline.main: Asian Shares Mostly Firmer, Gold Hits One-Month High

lead_paragraph: Asian shares and currencies were mostly firmer on Monday in the wake of surprisingly weak U.S. jobs numbers that revived speculation the Federal Reserve could keep policy loose for longer.
